headline.main: Major U.S. Report on the Diet Urges Reduction in Fat Intake

byline.original: By WARREN E. LEARY, Special to the New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: In the most comprehensive report on nutrition and health ever prepared by the Government, the Surgeon General today cited fat as a leading cause of disease that should be reduced in most people's diets and said overconsumption of fats and some other foods was a major national health problem.
